show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

header.title: The Egyptian Revolution’s Pending New Stage

title: The Egyptian Revolution’s Pending New Stage
content:
Jack’s return guest is Carl Finamore, eyewitness journalist to the Egyptian revolution in 2011 and 2012.  Carl explains… his analysis of the recent week’s events in Egypt and the likely new clash and upheaval within days occurring there.
  Will the religious fundamentalists, led by increasingly authoritarian president, Morsi, weather the growing storm?
Will the army, now threatening to intervene do so?
Will workers and secularists demanding improvements in the standard of living and political rights, now under attack by Morsi, force to the revolution to a higher stage?
Listen to Carl Finamore’s explanation and likely predictions.
